dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on gathering information about each other's actions and behaviors to help identify the assassin among us. Let's be vigilant and share any suspicions we may have.

dialogue.message: I agree with Alice's suggestion. Let's all be open about our actions and communicate any suspicious behavior we notice. This will help maintain trust and ensure everyone's safety in the game.
